snippet: Officials from the rail and petroleum industries agreed to examine quick ways to improve the safety of freight trains carrying crude oil after recent series of fiery accidents.
abstract: Officials from the rail and petroleum industries emerge from meeting with federal regulators agreeing to examine quick ways to improve the safety of freight trains carrying crude oil following a spate of fiery accidents.
lead_paragraph: Officials from the rail and petroleum industries agreed to examine quick ways to improve the safety of freight trains carrying crude oil after recent series of fiery accidents.

headline.main: U.S. Steps Up Scrutiny of Freight Train Safety
headline.print_headline: U.S. Steps Up Scrutiny of Freight Train Safety
